text:
Tableau | Palo Alto CA, Austin TX, Vancouver Canada | Sr. Engineers | ONSITE Tableau's (http://tableau.com) Sustaining Development team is growing and we need experienced developers focused on addressing current customer issues. Tableau's mission is to help people see and understand data and our team is building the APIs developers can use (http://developers.tableau.com) for everything from automation, custom visualizations, and connecting to new data sources.

Full job description is at :https://tableau.rolepoint.com/?job=ahBzfnJvbGVwb2ludC1wcm9kc...

If you're interested or want to know more please get in touch with me (Alex Camacho, I'm one of the Dev Managers for this extended team) directly -> email (acamacho@tableau.com),
